valid: For the period 12:00 (UTC) on Thu 18 Sep 2025 to 12:00 (UTC) on Fri 19 Sep 2025
general_synopsis: New low expected Rockall 991 by 0600 tomorrow. Low Fair Isle 985 moving steadily east and losing its identity
